Darwin spent his summer vacation collecting ground beetles and reading. In the winter, he went hunting with Fanny.

How’s school going?

It’s been great until now, but I’ll probably be bored from now on

given that both

my brother and George have left.

So you were just

fine without

me. I see.

What are you talking about?

I can’t

believe it!

Charles, I’m seeing someone else.

44
